identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

abstract.p: Jonathan Cranin, executive vice president and chief creative officer for North America at McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising, New York, is named to additional post of chief creative officer for Africa, Europe and Middle East; George S Wiedemann is named president and chief executive at Responsys.com, succeeding Anand Jagannathan, who continues as chairman and takes added new post of chief stategy officer; David Kessler is named to new post of executive vice president and worldwide account director at FCB New York, part of FCB Worldwide unit of True North Communications; Glen Jacobs is named senior partner and executive creative director for six offices of Bozell Kamstra, part of Bozell Group; succeeds Ron Anderson, vice chairman and executive creative director, who plans to retire at end of year (M)

block.p: Jonathan Cranin, executive vice president and chief creative officer for North America at McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising, New York, was named to the additional new post of chief creative officer for Africa, Europe and the Middle East. For his added duties, he will divide his time between London and New York. McCann is part of the McCann-Erickson World Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies.

Jonathan Cranin, executive vice president and chief creative officer for North America at McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising, New York, was named to the additional new post of chief creative officer for Africa, Europe and the Middle East. For his added duties, he will divide his time between London and New York. McCann is part of the McCann-Erickson World Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies.

* George S. Wiedemann was named president and chief executive at Responsys.com, Palo Alto, Calif., succeeding Anand Jagannathan, who continues as chairman and takes the added new post of chief strategy officer. Mr. Wiedemann had been chairman and chief executive at Grey Direct Worldwide, New York, where he is being succeeded by Lawrence Kimmel, who had been president of the Grey Direct New York office. The parent of Grey Direct, the Grey Global Group, recently took an unspecified equity stake in Responsys.com. * David Kessler was named to the new post of executive vice president and worldwide account director at FCB New York, part of the FCB Worldwide unit of True North Communications, responsible for the AT&T account. He had most recently been executive vice president and international account director at Lowe Lintas & Partners Worldwide, New York, part of the Lowe Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies. * Glen Jacobs was named senior partner and executive creative director for the six offices of Bozell Kamstra, part of the Bozell Group unit of True North Communications. Mr. Jacobs, who will be based in New York, succeeds Ron Anderson, vice chairman and executive creative director, who plans to retire at the end of the year, the agency said. Mr. Jacobs had been senior partner and worldwide creative director at Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide, New York, part of the WPP Group.
